skillTree.localised_description: Few horses growl with the ferociousness of a pack of wolves, yet Sinthgunt lives up to the Wild Father's image.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can pass through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: Setanta Lobos gnarls and howls as his body morphs into a gigantic wolf, lowering his magical potency but increasing his combat capabilities.

effects.description: Ability: "Wolf's Call"

ui_effects.localised_text: Wolf form loses the ability to cast powerful spells

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Few have mastered the essence of wind, even fewer managed to capture it. Raphael can sense the flow of any wind as if it was a natural sense.

skillTree.localised_description: Astronomers study the magic of the heavens, the stars, the upper atmosphere of the mortal world, and, just as importantly, the weather.

skillTree.localised_description: With the power of foresight the Magister Patriarch moves so swift he appears as if doubled, making him inviolable for any foe.

skillTree.localised_description: It is certainly for these reasons that Azyr's Magisters are known for their great preference for sky and star gazing, and for this reason the Magisters of the Celestial College are called "Celestial Wizards" or even sometimes "Blue Wizards".

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

items.colour_text: Amber wizards study Primal Thaumaturgy, the knowledge of Ghur. Ghur is the Brown Wind of Magic, and it is the Aethyr's bestial spirit. It is the breath of the animal wild. It is the hunt of the predator and the energy of the prey. Ghur is formed of the existence, experiences, and observation of wild beasts and untamed places. It is said to be a savage wind, as primal and unreasoning as it is devoid of malice, and it is therefore completely inhuman. It is said those who study Ghur have the ability to bome more beastlike, changing in both form and weight.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

Ability: "Mark of the Beast"
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

item_set.name: The Amber Brotherhood
item_set.description: Wizards of the Amber Brotherhood yearn to be away from civilisation, living in wilderness caves or sleeping under the stars. They drink from streams and hunt for their food. They catch their prey with their bare hands and eat its flesh raw, or so I am told. These are not hardships for an Amber Wizard, but a joyous celebration of the energy of their magical path.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment: Amber Wizard

items.colour_text: The Amber Order cares little for artifacts and equipment, yet the Mask of Ghur sure accounts as one among the empiric chronicles. It is worn only by the Wild Father, and Setanta Lobos has worn it for long enough for it to cause him to lose hair on his head or face, but instead has the short-haired silver-grey pelt of a timber wolf on his head and jaw. Becoming one with the Mask of Ghur, to become one with the Wild Hunt.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +15
Ability: "Mask of Ghur"

item_set.name: The Amber Brotherhood
item_set.description: Wizards of the Amber Brotherhood yearn to be away from civilisation, living in wilderness caves or sleeping under the stars. They drink from streams and hunt for their food. They catch their prey with their bare hands and eat its flesh raw, or so I am told. These are not hardships for an Amber Wizard, but a joyous celebration of the energy of their magical path.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment: Amber Wizard
